name: cSurvive Jam Version
description:
A simple simulation in which you take the roll as the boss of a group of persons that are not great at surviving. You must tell them when to eat, when to attack, and when to farm. If the population gets too high to quickly some of them will revolt! if all the persons die then the games over.

I made this game on my own in 8-14 hours, was pretty distracted by things so I don't have an exact time of actually working on it. Overall it was nice to finish a game to what I had planned for once, feels good =]
